channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overhanging car, 25th October
item.description:
Over hanging car. To big for drive on. Not complying with regs. Forcing pedestrians/parents into road.

item.title: Pothole, 25th October
item.description:
I did report this hole before and someone did come and fill it up. They, unfortunately did a terrible job. Rather than fixing it, they simply did a patch job and filled it up. Bow the tarmac has come back out and the hole is dangerously low. Everyone has to drive round and avoid the hole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72, Queen Street Place, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clothing thrown in woods, 25th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chapman's Lane, West Heath, London

item.title: Street lighting not working located on side wall of No1 Lydford Close, 25th October
item.description:
Hugely necessary street lighting No1 Lydford close (FIXED TO WALL) Not working for months. Reported this issue numerous times
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lydford Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad RTC, 25th October
item.description:
Nasty speeding RTC at this location this morning (I heard it happen as I live here, and reported it to the police myself). 3 cars written off, possibly lots of car debris (plastic, metal, glass, fluids) in the road and gutter. Will probably need some attention/cleaning. I think Albemarle should have another couple speed cameras because speeding is a problem on this long straight road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
